name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Teamcenter Engineer with over 10 years of experience in software development, specializing in **Java**, **JavaScript**, **C**, and **C++** for creating high-performance solutions in complex environments. Proficient in **Agile** methodologies and adept at **code management** and **issue tracking**. Proven track record in implementing and customizing **Teamcenter** and **PLM** solutions to enhance product development workflows.
Possesses extensive knowledge of **PDM** systems and development processes, ensuring seamless integration and adherence to industry standards. Strong ability to communicate effectively in both **German** and **English**, facilitating collaboration in multicultural teams.
Additionally, brings a solid foundation in modern technologies such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and experience in deploying cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS** with a passion for utilizing CI/CD principles to enhance project outcomes.
